sentence.Network_en: From November to December, Acorus calamus was still in growth.

list.abs: 采用硅胶柱层析和气相色谱-质谱(GC—MS)联用法,以玉米象(Sitophilus zeamais Motsch.)和谷蠹(Rhizopertha dominica Fab.)成虫为试虫,对石菖蒲(Acorus gramineus).
